content: Sessions is an unmitigated anal sphincter. he may as well be stuffing the ballot box with votes for people of his own persuasion. I refuse to give up my registered Republican status but I vote for the lesser of two evils way too often. These other unAmerican RINOs need to start their own “I want a single party” party. Dead folks voted for LBJ when he was running for office in Texas. Now those same racist former Dixiecrats turned fauxRepublicans are trying another way to rig elections: by disenfranchisement. I voted for Gerald Ford, didn’t like what Carter did with the Panama canal but admired the man for honesty. I voted for Bush the Elder but knew when he called his opponents “Bozos” that he didn’t really want a second term. crooked donnie the pussy grabbing media whore should be in prison for serial sexual assault what with his admitting to it and 13 women coming forward to corroborate his statement. Instead the cowards in control of Congress refuse to hang this incompetent vile and despicable orange paint huffing, bombastic bullying buffoon out to dry and shrivel in the full light of day. I am often thankful to be born in the USA, have served my country in Viet Nam and had a pretty good life but I cannot in honesty say that I am proud to be an American what with the WHITE TRASH president we have now condoning racist, bigotry and ethnic hatred.
